title: Define system architecture for SpeechSphereTraductor
description: Design the overall structure and components of the system, including frontend, backend, AI, and machine learning modules.

title: Develop AI and machine learning models for speech recognition and translation
description: Create the necessary AI and ML models to accurately transcribe spoken language and translate it in real-time.

title: Design and implement user interface for SpeechSphereTraductor
description: Create an intuitive and efficient user interface that allows users to easily initiate translations.

title: Set up and configure the database for storing user data and translation history
description: Create a database schema, set up the necessary tables, and configure access control to ensure data privacy.

title: Implement real-time speech recognition functionality
description: Develop the necessary algorithms and integrate them into the system to accurately recognize spoken language.
dependencies: Develop AI and machine learning models for speech recognition and translation

title: Implement real-time text-to-speech functionality
description: Develop the necessary algorithms and integrate them into the system to accurately convert translated text into speech.
dependencies: Develop AI and machine learning models for speech recognition and translation

title: Perform security audit on SpeechSphereTraductor
description: Review the system for potential vulnerabilities and implement necessary security measures.

title: Conduct integration tests on SpeechSphereTraductor
description: Test the various components of the system to ensure they function correctly together.

title: Review and approve the RFC for SpeechSphereTraductor
description: Review the design and implementation decisions made for SpeechSphereTraductor and provide feedback or approval.
